title: TDP-6 | 2021-W37 | Weekly Treasury Distribution Proposal
body:
# Overview
In an effort to provide consistency with our TDPs (Treasury Distribution Proposals), I advocate that we adopt a weekly TDP and attempt to plan a week in advance.

We can look at this as a establishing a “Best Practice” while embracing our “Full Transparency” founding principles.

The goal is to refine token rewards to incentivize solid contributions that move our community forward and most accurately reward efforts for any work done.

# Weekly DAO Business

## [1.0] Communications
- [[REtoken][Communication][Email] Announcement for winning Gitcoin DGov Hackathon (16Sep2021 | 2021-W37) [10 $RETOKEN]](https://trello.com/c/okZvkTbL)

### [1.1] Weekly REtoken Report
> *Would like to see us implement a "Weekly REtoken Report" where we focus on weekly Real Estate Tokenization news. I'm actually going to make a proposal to "Roadmap this" for 2021-Q4.*

## [2.0] New DRAFT Proposals &/or Created in Snapshot
- 75 $RETOKEN | [TDP-DRAFT] 2021-W37 | Weekly Token Distribution Proposal [Author: @yonks]
> *@yonks Will create a "template / HowTo" and then advocate that subsequent weekly TDPs award 25 $RETOKEN*
- 10 $RETOKEN | [TDP-5 | Community Member of the Week | 2021-W37 | Yonks Family (Jason, Tyler, & Brooke) | Author: @amymarcella](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmUy3R5BzceN8thpEZePXs1UticzfuUBQGQTxoMYpoiETE)

## [3.0] Weekly Recurring Events

### [3.1] Core Team Weekly Planning Session
- 1hr
- 25 $RETOKEN

### [3.2] Community Call

#### [3.2.1] Hosts

##### Call Owner | Primary Host
- 100 $RETOKEN / ea (1 person)

#### [3.2.2] Co-Host(s)
- 75 $RETOKEN / ea (up to 2)

##### Expectations
- see https://trello.com/c/tncyYLqJ
- 30min planning call with hosts ideally facilitated on Discord so that others may participate scheduled using sesh bot

#### [3.2.3] Participants:
- up to 25 $RETOKEN that can be rewarded by hosts for active participation in the Community Call (IE: emoji voting on a poll)
- 10 $RETOKEN for "Special Guests"

##### Expectations
- events RSVP using “sesh bot created event” in “Official REtoken DAO Discord” events channel
- engage in host directed activities to receive indicated amount of $RETOKEN
- obtain event POAP
- by holding $RETOKEN you are agreeing to the token policy in [RIP-1](link)

## [4.0] Misc Opportunities to earn $RETOKEN

### [4.1] Various ~30min tasks awarding 10 $RETOKEN
- [Add REtoken.DAO to the "Open Source DAO Market Research" Google Sheets [10 $RETOKEN]](https://trello.com/c/w5GYCmUx)

### [4.2] Various ~1hr tasks awarding 25 $RETOKEN
- [REtoken Pitch Fest for Solar Prize [25 $RETOKEN]](https://trello.com/c/j1V8jahq)
- [LiveStream | REtoken Special Guests on The DAO Hack [s0ep4] [25 $RETOKEN Guests / 10 $RETOKEN audience participation]](https://trello.com/c/DOcx46kg)
- [Create "1st Snapshot Proposal" POAP and award POAPs to Community Members already completed this DAO Milestone [25 $RETOKEN]](https://trello.com/c/YD5BKrIB)
> * [REtoken DAO | 1st Snapshot Proposal | 18Sep2021 | Amy](https://poap.gallery/event/7977)
> * [REtoken DAO | 1st Snapshot Proposal | 06Sep2021 | Ryan](https://poap.gallery/event/8117)
> * [REtoken DAO | 1st Snapshot Proposal | 06Sep2021 | Yonks](https://poap.gallery/event/8116)

### [4.3] New "HowTo" Processes
- [HowTo: Create an 📅 Event (Community Call, Working Group, etc) using the Discord sesh bot](https://trello.com/c/XkTAAr0H)
- [HowTo: Do a token airdrop with Coinvise.co (v3)](https://trello.com/c/cDQWkCmm)

# Prior 4 Weeks of Proposals

## 2021-W37
- [TDP-5 | Community Member of the Week | 2021-W37 | Yonks Family (Jason, Tyler, & Brooke) | Author: @amymarcella](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmUy3R5BzceN8thpEZePXs1UticzfuUBQGQTxoMYpoiETE)

## 2021-W36

- [TDP-3 | Community Member of the Week (2021-W36) | Nominated Theresa & Ryan | 08Sep2021](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmRtX7rj8xYRwmzqvdy35nVb1zfFwRudnye1mHt86JxLhs)
- [TDP-2 | Hackathon Working Groups 1-5 (50 $RETOKEN per WG) | 08Sep2021](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmXLR2N5EywMGaRGdmm4Z5bWZsgKc82bWdn2ZnVSoJ14Zy)
- [RIP-2 | Community Member of the Week | Reward Program | 06Sep2021](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmcxsXdiZZucmViEt2ikP4wFURc5AmGCX6mnhV7Hn4rQLM)
- [TDP-1 | Tokenomics Working Groups #1-3 | 06Sep2021](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmaRC6fsdoTs5Fuv6T9Pt7qkFEeo72LZ448Y5rnikjjYgS)
- [RIP-1 | Genesis Proposal (Season 0) | 06Sep2021](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmdJUQkW6dNWfuT5BZbx1qWzopgbpEFom1xaVsVCQCT7UD)

# Vote
Discord "temp check"
> https://discord.com/channels/877883581903564860/887120771393130526/889641496020680704

## Time to Vote!!
Yes - I approve

No - This is unreasonable
